explanation: [0-0] On a green lawn, there is a long wooden table. In the center of the end of the table, there is a standing ring. At the front end of the table, there is a black line. A man in white clothes and a white hat is standing by the table, holding a long stick with a rectangular board attached to the end, ready to hit a red disk on the table. In the distance, in front of the low houses, there is a crowd of people dressed in different clothes, their eyes focused on the long table.

[0-2] The man then pushes the red disk forward with the stick. The red disk slides to the other end of the table, hits the left side of the ring, and bounces back. The man shakes his head. A red cross appears at the bottom of the screen, indicating that the man in white has failed.
